.method hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IItemContainerProvider.FindItemByProperty(class System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple startAfter, int32 propertyId, object value) cil managed

virtual System::Windows::Automation::Provider::IRawElementProviderSimple ^ System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IItemContainerProvider.FindItemByProperty(System::Windows::Automation::Provider::IRawElementProviderSimple ^ startAfter, int propertyId, System::Object ^ value) = System::Windows::Automation::Provider::IItemContainerProvider::FindItemByProperty;

param.name: startAfter
param.span: 容器中的項目，從這個項目之後要開始搜尋。

span.span: The item in the container after which to begin the search.

param.name: propertyId
param.span: 包含要擷取之值的屬性。

span.span: The property that contains the value to retrieve.

summary.span: 擷取具有指定之屬性值的項目。

span.span: Retrieves an element with the specified property value.

returns.span: 符合搜尋準則的第一個項目，如果沒有符合的項目則為 。

span.span: The first item that matches the search criterion; otherwise, if no items match.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定`propertyId`參數`0`擷取後的下一個項目`startAfter`，不論中指定的值`value`。Set the `propertyId` parameter to `0` to retrieve the next item after `startAfter`, regardless of the value specified in `value`. 設定`startAfter`至`null`與第一個項目開始搜尋。Set `startAfter` to `null` to start the search with the first item. 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
